long: Dev et entrepreneur chez Ants. Passioné, énervé, constructeur (souvent en JS). Comme disent les autres, tout seul on va plus vite, ensemble on va plus loin et la route est longue, mais la voie est libre. Allons-y

bio.short: Ant with a passion for the web
long: Dev & entrepreneur @ Ants. Passionate, angry, builder (most often in JS). As others say, one goes faster alone, but further together and the road is long, but the path is clear. Let's get there!
